name: Wound
description:
Commander, please find attached my latest medical report on the officer corps.
The usual range of mental and physical maladies. I do recommend scheduling some R&R soon: a bit of time off does wonders.

And if you could please remind the crew that hangovers don't count as medical emergencies...
author: Chief Medical Officer Dr. J. Yamada

name: Fatigue
description:
We're still human, at the end of the day.
Even if they splice half a fish into your genome, or replace everything soft with plastics and steel.
Because if you aren't tired after fighting to kill? To live?

You aren't human.
author: Censored autobiography of Admiral [REDACTED]
